_sText:
A bud of mine gave me this idea to make a race out of mg_boulderdash. So as you can see, i did it. 

Blue side is the CT's,
Red side is the T's. 

The players try to make it to the top without getting killed by a boulder. If they do that, they get teleported to the top of the middle tower and push the magic button to kill the other team. Congrats, you win!

Thanks to flapjax for hosting the map during testing.

ENJOY!
